review_text: Another yawn-inducing direct-to-video action-thriller that takes place a month after the first film. Has yet another emotion-less "performance" from Bruce Willis who spends a good amount of time resting on a bed. The action is pretty inept and dialogue absolutely awful. The best thing is at least Chad Michael Murray was giving what I would call an "aw f it" performance. Otherwise this is as just as bland and forgettable as the first movie. **1.5/5**
